definition: to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The space geometry experiences and observes exercise and the answer detailed explanation.
sentences.chinese: 空间几何体练习题及答案详解。

sentences.english: Includes both Chinese and English languages Detailed.
sentences.chinese: 包括了中文和英文两种语言的详解。

sentences.english: But that need find all truth and solve all truth in detail, it is too difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是这需要发现和详解所有的真理，这太难了。

sentences.english: The teacher gave them the answer to that question without an adequate explanation.
sentences.chinese: 老师虽然告诉大家那道题的答案，但没有说明详解。

sentences.english: This week we feature our 10 Most Redeeming Films of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 本周我们将详解2009十大拯救电影。

sentences.english: He does not know, I know. To say and who may explain?
sentences.chinese: 他不懂，我知。可说与谁谁又愿详解？

sentences.english: Experts for you below prostate self massage method, sep.
sentences.chinese: 下面专家为您详解前列腺自我按摩方法。

sentences.english: It is even possible to use the Engineering Equation Solver EES to specify sub-problems.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以使用工程方程求解器EES来详解子问题。
